Table.Name: PRODUCTS
Table.Command: select ProductId, Name, Description, Icon from [dbo].[Products]
select ProductId, Name, Description, Icon from [dbo].[Products] where ProductId=@productId

Table.Name: IMAGES
Table.Command: select img.ImageId, img.Data from [dbo].[Images] img inner join [dbo].[ProductImages] prodImg on img.ImageId = prodImg.ImageId where prodImg.ProductId = @productId
